mapper.select: SELECT S_H_NAME, H.S_NO AS S_NO, S_H_AMOUNT, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY S_H_AMOUNT DESC) AS S_H_NO FROM S_HISTORY_TBL H JOIN SUPPORT_TBL S ON S.S_NO = H.S_NO ORDER BY S_H_AMOUNT DESC

SELECT H.H_NO, H_NAME AS H_R_CONTENT, COUNT(H_R_CONTENT) AS H_R_STATUS, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(H_R_CONTENT) DESC) AS H_R_NO FROM H_REVIEW_TBL H JOIN HOSPITAL_TBL S ON S.H_NO = H.H_NO GROUP BY H.H_NO, H_NAME ORDER BY H_R_STATUS DESC;
